errors.format: First name must start with a letter and only include letters a to z, hyphens, apostrophes, full stops, spaces and ampersands
errors.length: First name must have 35 characters or less

errors.format: Last name must start with a letter and only include letters a to z, hyphens, apostrophes, full stops, spaces and ampersands
errors.length: Last name must have 35 characters or less
